'''''lúmë''''' is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "time, hour".<ref name=PE17>{{PE|17}}, p. 13</ref>

==Forms==
*''lúmenna'' = "upon the time"<ref name=PE17/>
*''lúmesse'' = "at the hour"<ref>{{VT|43a}}, p. 34</ref>

==Examples==
*''[[Elen síla lúmenn' omentielvo|Elen síla '''lúmenn'''('''a''') omentielvo]]'' = "a star shines on the hour of our meeting"
*''[[Onnalúmë|Onna'''lúmë''']]'' = "Time of the Children"
*''[[Aia María|sí ar '''lúmessë''' ya firuvammë]]'' = "now and at the hour of our death"
